DIET-RANGE.D_snack1: trail mix made with 1 cup (80 grams) of dry cereal, 1/4 cup (30 grams) of granola, 1/4 cup (34 grams) of dried fruit, and 20 nuts

DIET-RANGE.D_dinner: 4 ounces (110 grams) of salmon, 1 cup (100 grams) of brown rice, and 5 asparagus spears

DIET-RANGE.D_dinner: 4-ounce (112-gram) chicken breast, 1/2 cup (84 grams) of quinoa, and 1 1/3 cups (85 grams) of sugar snap peas

Add oregano, bay leaves, chili powder, and cumin as desired for taste
